entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400005}Oh... Master {F843,0}, the Yamato's{F801}remote control is here on the floor.{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400003}Sorry, Master {F843,0}, but let me{F801}make sure of something...{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}{F813,1,400003}Sorry, Master {F843,0}, but let me{F801}make sure of something...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}Which are you going to: the Tokyo{F801}below the ceiling or the Tokyo{F801}engulfed in flames?{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}Which are you going to: the Tokyo{F801}below the ceiling or the Tokyo{F801}engulfed in flames?{F801}

entry.source: "The below-ceiling Tokyo."{F801}"The infernal Tokyo."{F801}"Neither, I think."{F801}
entry.target: "The below-ceiling Tokyo."{F801}"The infernal Tokyo."{F801}"Neither, I think."{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} pressed the button with{F801}the Tokyo below the ceiling in mind...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} pressed the button with{F801}the Tokyo below the ceiling in mind...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I just wanted to know; sorry for{F801}butting in. Go right ahead.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 {F843,0} pressed the button{F801}with the infernal Tokyo in mind...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 {F843,0} pressed the button{F801}with the infernal Tokyo in mind...{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I think that's a perfectly valid{F801}choice too.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Burroughs\0{F87A,2}OK. I think that's a perfectly valid{F801}choice too.{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The Yamato Perpetual Reactor is{F801}here before you...{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The Yamato Perpetual Reactor is{F801}here before you...{F801}

entry.source: 〉 The remote control is on the ground.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 The remote control is on the ground.{F801}

entry.source: Press the button{F801}Talk to Akira{F801}Leave{F801}
entry.target: Press the button{F801}Talk to Akira{F801}Leave{F801}

entry.source: 〉 Akira seems distracted.{F801}
entry.target: 〉 Akira seems distracted.{F801}

entry.source: Talk to him again{F801}Walk away{F801}
entry.target: Talk to him again{F801}Walk away{F801}

entry.source: {F812}Tokyo King Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401701}...Oh, it's you, Boss. Sorry, I was...{F801}just doing some thinking.{F801}{F802}I finally realized something after I{F801}became the King of Tokyo. When it comes{F801}to who I should be looking out for...{F801}{F802}I need to put everyone else first,{F801}right? I mean, I'm the King of Tokyo,{F801}after all.{F801}{F802}Having to worry about more than{F801}yourself is harder than a punch to{F801}the gut...{F801}{F802}To be honest, I already want to ditch{F801}it all, but I already told my sis{F801}about it... so I gotta stand firm.{F801}
entry.target: {F812}Tokyo King Akira\0{F87A,85}{F813,1,401701}...Oh, it's you, Boss. I mean, I'm the King of Tokyo,{F801}after all.{F801}{F802}Having to worry about more than{F801}yourself is harder than a punch to{F801}the gut...{F801}{F802}To be honest, I already want to ditch{F801}it all, but I already told my sis{F801}about it... so I gotta stand firm.{F801}
